reviewText: The movie is a masterpiece, but the price is so absurd. Just get the remastered Criterion  Collection for much, much less.

Today the price of this release is $318.90: would you pay that much for a DVD? If you're able to wait just a couple of months from now, you'll save ~300 bucks with the July 19 Criterion Collection release. Not to mention, The Criterion Collection folks clean up the audio/video quality (which is particularly lacking in current releases of this flick) PLUS provide boatloads of extras for the film buff. And yeah, 5 stars for the movie, not the price.
